places_with_reviews.name: Shri Gopinath Mandir
places_with_reviews.address: C878+8J4, Gopinath Mandir Marg, Gopeshwar, Uttarakhand 246401, India

reviews.text: Gopinath Temple is an ancient Hindu temple dedicated to Shiva in Gopeshwar, Chamoli District, Uttarakhand, India. It is situated in Gopeshwar village now part of Gopeshwar town. The temple stands out in its architectural proficiency; it is topped by a magnificent dome and the 30 sq ft (2.8 m2) sanctum sanctorum, which is aessible by 24 doors.

Shri Gopi Nath Temple is situated at Gopeshwar Chamoli. It's constructed by Pandava as per archeological survey in katyuri style. It's a beautiful temple of lord Shiva in hindu religion. Whenever you visit Chardham yatra you must have to visit here when you are comming from Kendar nath. It's a winter stay place of lord Rudranath.

Not to be missed in this Dev Bhumi Area. The Shivji Murthi is very serene. Lots of historical facts related to this temple.
Har Har Mahadev.

It is one of Pancha Kedar. Face part of Vrishabha form Lord Siva is here. A local woman explained all the surroundings to us very well. This Gopinath or Rudranath temple in Gopeswar can be seen in the route via Ukhimath from Kedarnath to Badrinath. Easily accessible. Here the Government hotel is available for lodging in the meantime. Lord Siva wished to join rasalila with Krishna and the other Gopikas. That is why Siva was called Gopinath. Krishna is in the form of tree which we can see and take leaves or flowers.
Best temple in Chamoli district and situated in gopeswar city.

places_with_reviews.name: Phulari House - Heart in Hills

reviews.text: Pleasant stay with amazing view and homely host! Really convenient for a night stay before visiting Auli and Chopta. Also perfect to spend a tranquil night in the hills! ❤️
One of the best property in Chamoli with various facilities. This place is very peaceful with beautiful mountain views. Kudos to Satyam for taking care of all our needs.
The stay was just marvellous. Rooms were spacious and clean. Amazing services, ambience with all basic amenities. Would recommend to stay a night here.

Such a beautiful place, created with a lot of love and passion❤️ It's quiet, peaceful & well amidst nature and it has all the necessary services you would ask for.
Give all your love and support to this amazing initiative :)
This place will always have my heart. Awesome view, had a very pleasant stay.

places_with_reviews.name: Tungnath

reviews.text:
Tungnath is another beautiful destination lying close to the mesmerizing hill station of Chopta. Situated at a height of 3680 meters above sea level, Tungnath is the highest temple in the world dedicated to Lord Shiva.

The unprecedented Himalayan view from the meadows at Tungnath temple is leave anyone is awe. The natural beauty comes to its full glory at Tungnath temple, which is also one of the famous five Panch Kedar shrines of Uttarakhand.

For someone travelling to Chopta, a visit to Lord Shiva’s abode at Tungnath is highly recommended. Generally, the pilgrimage to Tunganath is undertaken as part of the Panch Kedar trekking covering all five temples over a 170 km route (road cum trek length) starting from Rishikesh in the order of: Kedarnath, Tungnath, Rudranath, Madhyamaheswar and Kalpeshwar.

places_with_reviews.name: Shiv Mandir
places_with_reviews.address: C84F+RGJ, Gopeshwar Chamoli Rd, Ghursal, Gopeshwar, Uttarakhand 246401, India

reviews.text: Shiv mandir near by haldapani in Gopeshwar city

Shiv mandir of Patiyala har is actually also a  Hanuman Mandir (Temple) Named Kalpeshwar Mahadev.  It was first a hanuman temple under pipal tree but local villagers collected money and built a proper temple and also a rest and waiting house behind the temple. It is very peaceful and holy place. In special occasion and festivals , local villagers organise Katha vachan (story telling of God) with Puja and aarti.
It is very peaceful place stablish between trees. But there is nogood parking in surrounding
